about_the_game: Recruit your squad, stock up on supplies, explore ruins in a rickety boat, battle monsters, collect loot, talk with castaway NPCs in camp, upgrade skills and items, feed the crew, rest the weary, repair your boat, ...and return to the perilous ruins again. The Barnacle Squad is a turn-based tactical RPG with your crew battling vicious hordes washed up from the depths. From a dozen unique character classes choose special skills that can turn the tides of battle. Different combinations of player units versus a wide variety of enemies create interesting and challenging tactical decisions.

content_descriptors.notes: This game includes violence with cartoonish animated blood and gore, corpses. Not appropriate for all ages.

short_description: The Barnacle Squad is a tactical turn-based RPG set in the slimy, tentacle-infested waters of a flooded necropolis. Choose from 12 distinct character classes as you manage your squad of mercenaries rowing through a labyrinth of nautical fiends.
